text: The women's doubles tennis event at the 2015 Summer Universiade was held from July 5 to 11 at the Jawol International Tennis Court in Gwangju, South Korea. Han Na-lae and Lee So-ra of South Korea won the gold medal defeating Hsu Chieh-yu and Lee Ya-hsuan of Chinese Taipei in the final, 6–4, 6–4. Erina Hayashi and Aiko Yoshitomi of Japan and Noppawan Lertcheewakarn and Varatchaya Wongteanchai of Thailand won the bronze medals. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== *Main Draw Category:Tennis at the 2015 Summer Universiade
title: Tennis at the 2015 Summer Universiade – Women's Doubles
